trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of <xref:System.IAsyncResult> for use by XML Web service proxies to implement the standard asynchronous method pattern.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação de <xref:System.IAsyncResult>para utilização por proxies de serviço Web de XML para implementar o padrão de método assíncronas padrão.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous XML Web service request.
trans-unit.target: Cancela um pedido de serviço XML Web assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object provided in the last parameter to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""></xref> method asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto fornecido no último parâmetro para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""> </xref> chamada de método assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> provided in the last parameter to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""></xref> method call.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>fornecidas o último parâmetro para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Begin" name="Begin" href=""> </xref> chamada de método.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>que é utilizado para aguardar que uma operação assíncrona concluir.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> can be used to perform a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>, or <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> to wait for the asynchronous call to complete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>podem ser utilizados para efetuar um <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>, ou <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>a aguardar para concluir a chamada assíncrona.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>que é utilizado para aguardar que uma operação assíncrona concluir.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the Begin call completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a chamada de Begin concluída de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: If CompletedSynchronously is set to `true` within the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate, it is probable that the thread that called <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> is the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Se CompletedSynchronously estiver definido como `true` dentro de <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegado, é provável que o thread que chamado <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A>é o thread actual.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you should be careful about making another asynchronous Begin call from the callback method, since it can cause the stack to grow without bound if the calls continue to complete synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, deve ter cuidado pela efetuar Begin assíncrono outra chamada do método de chamada de retorno, uma vez que pode fazer com que a pilha de aumentar sem vinculado se as chamadas continuam a conclusão de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the call should be completed at the original call site, outside the callback method.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, a chamada deve ser concluída no site de chamada original, fora do método de chamada de retorno.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Begin call completed synchronously; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chamada de Begin concluída de forma síncrona; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the asynchronous XML Web service request has completed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o pedido de serviço XML Web assíncrono foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the asynchronous XML Web service request has completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o pedido de serviço XML Web assíncrono foi concluída; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
